title: Provident Park
subtitle: Experience the perfect blend of modern living and nature in Bangalore's most promising residential township.
description: Provident Park Square is a world-class residential project located in the prime area of Judicial Layout, Off Kanakapura Road, Bangalore. Spread across 20 acres of land area, Provident Park Square offers 2 & 3 BHK homes sized from 529 sq. ft. to 1314 sq. ft. with luxurious in-home features as well as amenities at great prices. For those seeking quality and luxury living, this project is your ideal choice to experience exceptional living.
